title: All my ranked teammates match history in a nutshell.....
body:
http://imgur.com/0Osjg4k

Is this only me or...?

Edit: It's my 3rd time using photoshop, cut me some slack, dad.

replies.body: Is that blue ezreal at the bottom?
How did he even lose?
photoshop fail, just look around the kda and item borders, or I didn't get the joke ?
how do i get to the kittens if the train station is so far away.
"Nothing goes over my head! My reflexes are too fast, I would catch it."
Hahaahaa gurdians reference

down votes dont mean very much from unintelligent casual players like 90% of the people on this forum.
thats what she said
ITS A JOKE
that icon is :(

Joke -->

Your head
Last row first item border bruh.
LOL I saw the photoshop fail because there's this weird line after the kda of Gragas, but I get the joke, so its all good.
how do you always go 2/11/4

If you look at the image carefully you'll see that it is edited heavily. An example of the edits is the Gragas KDA, you can see a slight shadow of the edit that wasn't aligned correctly. :)

If this was sarcasm you should remember to put /s or :P or kappa so that others understand ^.^
that gragas shadow thing was showing up in the original image, the actual edit of the kda's were very clean (for a two minute edit at least)

Are you saying Gragas is so fat his image casts a shadow. Because that'd be insensitive. 


And actuate. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Welp, at least no one will say you are short on mana :p
Bow before the mana overlords!
Ik that is a joke but tears dont stack, it's a unique passive. {{item:3070}}
But if you upgrade all of them into a {{item:3040}} , the 1000 mana is actually a stat, so it could work in the long run.
The long con.
If you fully stack 6 tears, then build one of the upgrades, which then upgrades itself (e.g. becomes muramana), the other tears will reset to 0. This is a REALLY long con.
{{champion:13}} Worth.
the really long urgot con. at the end of it you end with a massive shield and you never stop spamming.
{{item:3070}} indeed :(

rank me up
http://imgur.com/m9sTbX8
cant rank up

The fact that people think youre dumb enough to say this seriously and have people believe u amazes me
I thought it was very funny
Same.

my teammates:

http://i.imgur.com/FPY2JCl.jpg
Just start playing solo queue instead. Wait, fuuuuuuck.
sorry i dont have friends, i cant play ranked this season

Its not you. Its your teammates. Look at their KDA. It clearly took time and effort on their part to end every game with the same score. (Trolls amirite?) Never blame yourself. No one gets ELO by degrading themselves, everyone just pays for it.
 
Moral of the story: blame others and hire an ELO booster... on dynamic queue... who streams themselves boosting others... 

I dont know man, I thought I was going somewhere with this. Whatever.

You do realize this was a joke, right? I understand i'm wood 5 :p just sometimes it can be frustrating when you're yi and all lanes are 0-3 b4 anyone hits lvl 5 and say its your fault for not ganking at 100 health 

http://imgur.com/IOlvrf7

It's been a rough ranked day for me.
Twas a joke dude. And I'm the one getting accused? Sheesh
im pretty sure they were making a joke back XD
Thats some pretty shitty photoshop buddy.
3rd time using it ;-;
Look at the cs tho, and they try perfectly for those scores you know
why 2/11/4 though? is this photoshopped?
Nah, it's just Tyler1's match history.
Totally him, not a single Draven game

I have problems with ranked too. I carry super hard as an adc in all my norms matches, but the second I got to ranked it's like my supp and teammates lost their intelligence. I lost my prelims 1/9 and got put in bronze because me team just kept feeding or not helping. One game even had a guy just laughing and sitting in the spawn. Another, mid lost a tower and everyone but me surrendered. My games in ranked are always like this and it's so frustrating because I know I'm at least a Silver III player. I wish solo queue was based on just you instead of your entire team.

one time i had a bot lane ap talon.

you would not like bot lane ap talon
you fucked up the photoshop on gragas
That mark was there on the original idk why, visual bug maybe, i actually only touched the items and only enough pixels to cover the score.
That mark was there on the original idk why, visual bug maybe
